Posts.Content: Well that’s exactly what i’m praying for and yep I had the song picked for the funeral too! Went back to work today, being busy with other people’s worries is so much better. Thanks for your message.
Posts.Title: Test results!

Posts.Content: Hi i’m recovering well from a recent mastectomy with mesh/expanding implant. T2 x2, N2 with 4 of 22 nodes, currently MX pending MRI on liver following something showing on a CT scan. Pretty scared right now, I was feeling positive about fighting this, believing it was primary cancer but now it might not be. I’m told that CT scans can show up all sorts on the Liver, not necessarily cancer and I wondered if anyone had any experiences they could share? Thank you x
Posts.Title: Test results!

Posts.Content: Thank you, that’s the hope I need to hear whichever way it goes. You are a wonderful positive person x
Posts.Title: Test results!

Posts.Content: Thanks Sharon that’s encouraging! I’m really pleased you had a happy outcome. Best wishes Poppy
Posts.Title: Test results!
